meta.name: note
meta.content: Not clear what the edition was

chapter.name: Second Sunday after Pentecost: All Saints of Russia
Second Sunday after Pentecost: God-bearing Fathers on Mount Athos
Third Sunday after Pentecost: New Martyrs of Christ, Who Have Suffered since the Fall of Constantinople
June 1: Holy Martyr Justin the Philosopher
June 2: St. Nicephorus the Confessor, Patriarch of Constantinople
June 2: Holy Greatmartyr John the New
June 3: Holy Martyr Lucillian
June 4: St. Metrophanes, Patriarch of Constantinople
June 5: Hieromartyr Dorotheus, Bishop of Tyre
June 6: St. Bessarion the Wonderworker & St. Hilarion the New
June 7: Hieromartyr Theodotus, Bishop of Ancyra
June 7: Holy Martyrs Cyriaca, Valeria & Maria
June 8: Holy Martyr Theodore the General
June 9: Saint Cyril, Archbishop of Alexandria
June 10: Hieromartyr Timothy, Bishop of Prussa
June 11: Holy Apostles Bartholemew & Barnabas
June 11: Commemoration of the Wonder-working Icon of the All-holy Theotokos, Known as "It is truly meet"
June 11: Holy Protomartyrs of China, Slain during the Boxer Rebellion
June 12: Venerable Fathers Onuphrius & Peter the Athonite
June 12: Venerable John, Heraclemon, Andrew and Theophilus of Egypt
June 13: Holy Martyr Aquilina & Holy Hierarch Triphyllius, Bishop of Leucosia in Cyprus
June 14: Holy Prophet Elisha & St. Methodius, Patriarch of Constantinople
June 15: Holy Prophet Amos
June 15: St. Jonah, Metropolitan of Moscow & All Russia
June 15: St. Augustine, Bishop of Hippo
June 15: St. Jerome the Blessed, of Stridon
June 16: Hieromartyr & Wonderworker Tychon of Amathus
June 16: St. Tikhon, Wonderworker of Kaluga
June 17: Holy Martyrs Manuel, Sabel & Ismael
June 18: Holy Martyr Leontius
June 19: Holy Apostle Jude, the Brother of the Lord
June 19: St. John, Archbishop of Shanghai & San Francisco
June 20: Holy Hieromartyr Methodius, Bishop of Patara
June 21: Holy Martyr Julian of Tarsus
June 22: St. Eusebius, Bishop of Samosata
June 23: Holy Martyr Agrippina
June 23: Meeting of the Vladimir Icon
June 24: Nativity of the Honorable & Glorious Prophet & Forerunner John the Baptist
June 25: Holy Martyred Nun Febronia
June 25: Righteous Prince Peter & Princess Febronia, Wonderworkers of Murom
June 26: Appearance of the Tikhvin Icon
June 27: St. Sampson the Hospitable
June 28: Translation of the Relics of the Holy Wonderworkers Cyrus & John
June 29: Holy, Glorious, All-praised Apostles Peter & Paul
June 30: Synaxis of the Twelve Holy, Glorious & All-praised Apostles
